body_html:
Spent a lot time to choose a Transform Graph function combination to reduce the size and run time of my custom graph.
But no option works for me to do both using: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/README.md
The most promising one was the above combination which I tried, but it generates incorrect results.
Could you recommend any Transform Graph combination that would reduce size as well as run time. Thanks.

body:

But no option works for me to do both using: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms/README.md
